item.title: ::starter
item.dc:creator: @ChemicalReaction1 ChemicalReaction™
item.description:
@ChemicalReaction1 wrote:

Peter. Stfu. Starter kits are harder than they look, here you go dre.
First of all. Go to the folder “logs”… And make a Folder called starter
and one called blackmarks

[code]if (command.startsWith(“starter”)){
if(kitstarter >= 1)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Is a greedy twat who got a blackmark");

BufferedWriter bw = null;
try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/blackmarks.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" Tryed to Cheat, black mark! ");
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
blackmark +=1;
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error with black mark logging!”);
}
}

}
else if(kitstarter <= 0){

kitstarter +=1;
BufferedWriter bw = null;

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Got their starter kit get your’s by typing ::starter");
addItem(995,2000000);
try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/starters.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" Got their starter pack ");
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error with stater pack logging!”);
}
}
}

else if(command.startsWith(“scheck”));
{
sendMessage(“You now have “+kitstarter+” starter packs”);
}
}[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: August 29, 2007, 02:34:17 PM[/size][hr]Omfg. people stop posting pointless codes that dont work -.-

Read full topic

item.title: ::starter
item.dc:creator: @Dre Dre
item.description:
@Dre wrote:

[quote=“Peter787, post:2, topic:138170”]You’re kidding me right?[/quote] yer thats why i posted this here, as a joke -.-

[quote=“mati2, post:3, topic:138170”]If you type ::starter you receive 100k and if u try to do it again then u get message " You have already received your starter pack !"

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 100000); sendMessage("You have just received 100k, good luck in game :)"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack !"); } }[/quote]
thanks mate, ill giv that a try
EDIT: didnt work, got 4 errors

Read full topic

item.title: ::starter
item.dc:creator: @mati2 mati2
item.description:
@mati2 wrote:

If you type ::starter you receive 100k and if u try to do it again then u get message " You have already received your starter pack !"

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 100000); sendMessage("You have just received 100k, good luck in game :)"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack !"); } }

Read full topic
